name: Ray of Light
description: Ray of Light - Horror game with beautiful graphics and sound. You will not be bored.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core i3-7300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon R7 370 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1540 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0с
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core i5-6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD RX 470 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1540 MB available space
